
{{alias}}( x )
    Evaluates Spenceâ€™s function, which is also known as the dilogarithm.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    y: number
        Function value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 3.0 )
    ~-1.437
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.0 )
    ~1.645
    > y = {{alias}}( -9.0 )
    NaN
    > y = {{alias}}( NaN )
    NaN

    See Also
    --------
